name: Electro Service 2: Electric Boogaloo
description:
Ludum Dare 46 game created by Fedora and Astrid. Feel free to visit us at gakutech.com

Extra credits:
- SourceCodePro fonts
- TheJazzPiano music, by Bensound.com

Software used:
- Python
- VSCode
- Adobe Photoshop

How to play:
- Hover over things to see what they do in the info screen.
- Try to keep the patient alive as long as you can.
- The game will keep getting harder and harder.

Made with love, enjoy! <3
